channel.title: [REQ] I need Help with a source a client [REQ]
channel.description:
[b]I got a source and client called XpvpXX i DIDNOT MAKE IT it was in downloads list and i want it to connect to my ip i have no-ip and i oppened it so does like if i change the server ip it automaticly changes to it? Im a begginer at this kind of stuff also explain what compile means please i tried all the tutorials but none of them work and i been trying to make a client for about 3 weeks and none work[/b]
[u][size=10pt][font=Verdana]PLZ HELP OR MAKE THE VERY FIRST TIMER TUT![/font][/size][/u]
